      • AddShip

        public boolean AddShip(int x1,
              int y1,
              int x2,
              int y2)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Add a ship to the board. Add a ship to the board. An exception is thrown if the ship would collide with another ship already placed. Ships cannot be placed next to each other, not even diagonally. Ships cannot be placed diagonally. x2 and y2 should be greater than x1 and y1 respectively
        Parameters:
        x1 -
        y1 -
        x2 -
        y2 -
        Returns:
        True if the ship was successfully placed, False if another ship already occupies the cells
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
